original_text: And I will turn thee back, and leave but the sixth part of thee, and will cause thee to come up from the north parts, and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel:
korean_text: 너를 돌이켜서 이끌고 북쪽 끝에서부터 나와서 이스라엘 산 위에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And I will turn thee back
and leave but the sixth part of thee
and will cause thee to come up from the north parts
and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel
